### Summary statistics

```{r}
dt_time <- dt %>%
  mutate(datetime = gsub("T", " ", datetime)) %>%
  mutate(datetime = gsub("Z", "", datetime)) %>%
  mutate(event = if_else(strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") <= 
    strftime("2020-04-23 23:25:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "1", "")) %>%
  mutate(event = if_else(strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") <= 
    strftime("2020-04-24 14:25:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") & 
    strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") >= 
    strftime("2020-04-24 13:20:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "2", event)) %>%
    mutate(event = if_else(strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") <= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 04:25:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") & 
    strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") >= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 03:20:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "3", event)) %>%
    mutate(event = if_else(strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") <= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 15:25:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") & 
    strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") >= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 14:20:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "4", event)) %>%
    mutate(event = if_else(strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") <= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 22:30:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") & 
    strftime(datetime, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") >= 
    strftime("2020-04-25 21:20:00",format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "5", event)) %>%
    mutate(event = as.factor(event))

```

```{r}
summary(dt)
```

```{r}
summary(dt_time)
```

```{r}
table(dt_time$event)
```


### Plots

```{r}
dt_tweet <- dt_time %>%
  filter(language == "en" & compound != 0)
hist(dt_tweet$compound)
```

```{r}         
table(dt_tweet$language, useNA = "always")
```
```{r}

summary(dt_tweet)
```

```{r}

ggplot(dt_tweet, aes(x = event)) +
  geom_bar() + 
  ggtitle('Count of tweets')

```




```{r}
# histograms
ggplot(dt_tweet, aes(x=compound, color=event)) +
  geom_histogram(fill="lightblue", alpha=0.5) + ggtitle('Count of sentiment score')
#position="identity"

```
